title: Theres a reason I hate normals.
body:
And only play ranked.

Having to level to 30 is going to cause me to want to kill myself.

All these bronze smurfs or just plain new players whining about "calling" roles at each other. Saying they can't support and then instalocking {{champion:17}}   jungle or some shit.

It's cancerous, and I hate it. I need level 30 as fast as possible..

God help me.
